types.description: Receives a JSON object and send, to the appropriated port, the value of the child element pointed by key.

in_ports.description: Port to receive the JSON object where key will be located.
in_ports.name: IN

in_ports.description: Receives a string packet to override the key set as option.
in_ports.name: KEY

types.name: json/object-get-key

members.description: The key of the JSON object child to access.
members.name: key

out_ports.description: The integer value of a given key, if a number
out_ports.name: INT

out_ports.description: The string value of a given key, if a string
out_ports.name: STRING

out_ports.description: The boolean value of a given key, if a boolean
out_ports.name: BOOLEAN

out_ports.description: The float value of a given key, if a number
out_ports.name: FLOAT

out_ports.description: The JSON object of a given key, if a JSON object
out_ports.name: OBJECT

out_ports.description: The JSON array of a given key, if a JSON array
out_ports.name: ARRAY

out_ports.description: An empty packet if value pointed by given key is null.
out_ports.name: NULL

types.description: Receives a JSON object and send, to the appropriated port, the value of the child element pointed by path.

in_ports.description: Port to receive the JSON object where path will be located.
in_ports.name: IN

in_ports.description: Receives a string packet to override the path set as option.
in_ports.name: PATH

types.name: json/object-get-path

members.description: The path of the JSON object child to access.
members.name: path

out_ports.description: The integer value of a given path, if a number
out_ports.name: INT

out_ports.description: The string value of a given path, if a string
out_ports.name: STRING

out_ports.description: The boolean value of a given path, if a boolean
out_ports.name: BOOLEAN

out_ports.description: The float value of a given path, if a number
out_ports.name: FLOAT

out_ports.description: The JSON object of a given path, if a JSON object
out_ports.name: OBJECT

out_ports.description: The JSON array of a given path, if a JSON array
out_ports.name: ARRAY

out_ports.description: An empty packet if value pointed by given path is null.
out_ports.name: NULL

types.description: Receives a JSON array and send, to the appropriated port, the value of the child element pointed by path.

in_ports.description: Port to receive the JSON array where path will be located.
in_ports.name: IN

in_ports.description: Receives a string packet to override the path set as option.
in_ports.name: PATH

types.name: json/array-get-path

members.description: The path of the JSON array child to access.
members.name: path

out_ports.description: The integer value of a given path, if a number
out_ports.name: INT

out_ports.description: The string value of a given path, if a string
out_ports.name: STRING

out_ports.description: The boolean value of a given path, if a boolean
out_ports.name: BOOLEAN

out_ports.description: The float value of a given path, if a number
out_ports.name: FLOAT

out_ports.description: The JSON object of a given path, if a JSON object
out_ports.name: OBJECT

out_ports.description: The JSON array of a given path, if a JSON array
out_ports.name: ARRAY

out_ports.description: An empty packet if value pointed by given path is null.
out_ports.name: NULL

types.description: Get the number of children elements in a JSON object.

in_ports.description: Port to receive the JSON object to count children.
in_ports.name: IN

types.name: json/object-length

out_ports.description: The number of children from this JSON object
out_ports.name: OUT

types.description: Get all keys contained in this JSON object.

in_ports.description: port to receive the JSON object.
in_ports.name: IN

types.name: json/object-get-all-keys

out_ports.description: Each key from the JSON object received in IN port. Multiple keys may be emitted for each JSON object
out_ports.name: OUT

out_ports.description: Send true if object is empty, false otherwise.
out_ports.name: EMPTY

types.description: Receives a JSON array and send, to the appropriated port, the value of the child element pointed by index.

in_ports.description: Port to receive the JSON array.
in_ports.name: IN

in_ports.description: Receives an int packet to override the index set as option.
in_ports.name: INDEX

types.name: json/array-get-at-index

members.description: The index of the element to be sent to OUT port. If negative, no value will be sent before setting index using INDEX port
members.name: index

out_ports.description: The integer value of a given index, if a number
out_ports.name: INT

out_ports.description: The string value of a given index, if a string
out_ports.name: STRING

out_ports.description: The boolean value of a given index, if a boolean
out_ports.name: BOOLEAN

out_ports.description: The float value of a given index, if a number
out_ports.name: FLOAT

out_ports.description: The JSON object of a given index, if a JSON object
out_ports.name: OBJECT

out_ports.description: The JSON array of a given index, if a JSON array
out_ports.name: ARRAY

out_ports.description: An empty packet if value pointed by given index is null.
out_ports.name: NULL

types.description: Get the number of elements from JSON array.

in_ports.description: Port to receive the JSON array to count elements.
in_ports.name: IN

types.name: json/array-length

out_ports.description: The number of elements in this JSON array
out_ports.name: OUT

types.description: Get all elements contained in this JSON array.

in_ports.description: port to receive the JSON array.
in_ports.name: IN

types.name: json/array-get-all-elements

out_ports.description: Each int value from number elements in the array. Multiple values may be emitted for each JSON array
out_ports.name: INT

out_ports.description: Each string value from string elements in the array. Multiple values may be emitted for each JSON array
out_ports.name: STRING

out_ports.description: Each boolean value from boolean elements in the array. Multiple values may be emitted for each JSON array
out_ports.name: BOOLEAN

out_ports.description: Each float value from number elements in the array. Multiple values may be emitted for each JSON array
out_ports.name: FLOAT

out_ports.description: Each JSON object value from JSON object elements in the array. Multiple values may be emitted for each JSON array
out_ports.name: OBJECT

out_ports.description: Each JSON array value from JSON array elements in the array. Multiple values may be emitted for each JSON array
out_ports.name: ARRAY

out_ports.description: Empty packets for each null element in array. Multiple values may be emitted for each JSON array
out_ports.name: NULL

out_ports.description: Send true if array is empty, false otherwise.
out_ports.name: EMPTY
